paper_abstract: Applications of sensor networks have become. an emerging technology which can monitor a specific area and collect environmental data around the district. The energy of sensor nodes is tightly constrained so that there is a need to control the power consumption in node operations such as transmission and routing. In this paper, we carry out analysis on energy-aware routing in order to minimize the path loss. Our goal is to prolong the network lifetime and case the management of sensor networks.
paper_title: Energy-aware routing analysis in wireless sensors network
